name: Square Defender (halo123proplem)
description:
You are little Skully, try to keep the squares and rectangles out of your basket

Move mouse around to aim, left mouse button to fire

'R' to restart the game.

Each block has a default score of 5 but with each second it is on screen it becomes more blue and increases it's score by 5  up to a limit of 100, at 100 it will start flashing

A block grants you score if it lands outside your bucket.

You lose score when a block lands inside your bucket. You lose twice the worth of the block, so you lose 200 score from a flashing block and subsequently lose.

When you win the screen starts flashing in random colors. 

You "win" by either scoring a flashing block or getting a score of 1000, but you can still continue infinitely. 

You lose by getting a score of -15 or less, or if a block worth 80 points or more goes into your basket

Made using only one rendered sprite and one audio source, with the exception of the score counter.
